templates: You find {amount} in a {kingdom_era} pouch, bearing the mark of a {context_descriptor} merchant.
A small pile of {amount} lies scattered on the ground, remnants of a {kingdom_era} skirmish.
Tucked away in a hidden alcove, you discover {amount}, gleaming faintly in the {context_descriptor} light.
A {quality} {item_type}, made of {material} with a {part_descriptor}. It has a {cultural_origin} design and shows {wear_tear}. It appears to be {age_descriptor}.
You discover a {quality} {item_type}, crafted from {material}. Its {part_descriptor} is intricately designed, hinting at its {cultural_origin} origins. It is {wear_tear} and looks {age_descriptor}.

Lying amidst the rubble is a {quality} {item_type} of {material}, featuring a {part_descriptor}. Its {cultural_origin} craftsmanship is evident, despite its {wear_tear} condition and {age_descriptor} appearance.

A {rarity} {item_type} known as the {item_name}, it was {creation_story_verb} by a {creator_type} in the {creation_location} during the {historical_event}. Its {quirk_descriptor} nature was often remarked upon by its {previous_owner_archetype} owner. It is activated by a {activation_quirk}.

Found in a {creation_location}, the {item_name} is a {rarity} {item_type} that was {creation_story_verb} by a {creator_type} during the {historical_event}. Its {previous_owner_archetype} owner found its {quirk_descriptor} quirk to be quite unusual. It is activated by a {activation_quirk}.
